title: Miro Training
content:
2025 Training Schedule *Click one of the links to add it to your calendar so you can join the session. Miro AI Overview Tuesday, February 25th, 12:00pm-1:00pm CST Tuesday, March 4th, 12:00pm-1:00pm CST Miro 101 Training (Basic Users) Wednesday, February 26th, 3:00pm-4:00pm CST Monday, March 3rd, 12:30pm-1:30pm CST Miro 201 Training (Board Owners) Thursday, February 27th, 2:00pm-3:00pm CST Tuesday, March 4th, 1:30-2:30pm CST Miro 301 Training (Advanced Skills) Friday, February 28th, 9:30am-10:30am CST Wednesday, March 5th, 3:00pm-4:00pm CST 2023 Training Schedule Miro 101 Training (Basic users) Monday, August 21st, 10:00am-11:00am CDT Wednesday, August 23rd, 1:00pm-2:00pm CDT Miro 201 Training (Board owners) Monday, August 21st, 11:00am-12:00pm CDT Friday, August 25th, 1:30pm-2:30pm CDT Miro 301 Training (Advanced users) Monday, August 21st, 12:00pm-1:00pm CDT Monday, August 28th, 1:00pm-2:00pm CDT Miro Office Hours (Any Miro Topic) Wednesday, August 30th, 4:00pm-5:00pm CDT Friday, September 1st, 2:00pm-3:00pm CDT *Click one of the links above to add it to your calendar so you can join the session.
